name: Bramble
long_description:
Bramble is an AI-powered real estate brokerage that provides end-to-end homebuying services for one simple flat fee. Get instant AI help to set up tours, evaluate homes, submit offers, and close confidently - with on-demand support from expert agents when you need it. 

We recently opened early access in CA and in just a few weeks have gotten hundreds of sign-ups, several touring buyers, and have submitted multiple offers across the state - all with near-zero marketing spend. We just offered buyers what they really wanted: a high-quality experience for a reasonable price.
one_liner: AI-powered buy-side brokerage with a simple flat fee
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
